name: Space.Xscape
description:
Controls:
Move with: W A S D
Use pickaxe with mouse and left click
Use arrow keys and space in menus
Press the numbers 1 2 3 4 to use item

Soundtrack

Credits:
JonasMG - Programming, Art and Concept

Greyson JS - Sound, Art and Concept
greysons.bandcamp.com
Twitter: @GreysonJs
Facebook.com/greysonjs

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2nd 1-bit game jam

Astrology: The game is set in space

Casino/Gambling: Every time the player has to destroy a rock they gamle their lives, it is unknown what is inside the rock. When crafting stuff there is no recipe book, the player must remember or guess.

Chemistry: When destroying rocks the player gathers atoms which can be crafted into useful items.
